backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, access control, user data maps, posts, ponds, ribbits, likes, tags, and activity tracking types and state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two LilyCard hover‑related features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files detailing layout, pages, components, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root div, metadata, favicon, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and global providers including theme and toast for all pages.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using bookmark state hooks with customizable colors.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a comment display component.

frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapping pages with header, footer, and a mobile sidebar drawer that closes on navigation.

frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Shows an image in a fixed 4:3 frame, using a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 images. Supports click handling and lazy loading.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Implements a slide‑in mobile drawer that hosts the LeftSidebar and manages body scroll lock. Includes a scrim overlay and animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Displays pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave actions with loading states. Fetches pond metadata and membership info.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile‑optimized pond header showing banner, profile image, name, description, and tab navigation. Navigates between feed and about views.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user's ribbit with avatar, timestamp, content, and link to the related lily. Fetches avatar and lily information.

frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a ribbit with avatar, timestamp, likes, and a nested reply form with like/unlike and reply creation logic.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Renders an avatar image with a tiny blurred placeholder that transitions to the full image once loaded.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Shows trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using fetched pond and lily data.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Full‑screen mobile search modal showing trending searches or suggestions and handling query input and selection.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown for desktop search input that displays trending searches or suggestions based on query state.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Displays top, trending, and newest tags with activity stats using modular tag list components.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled tab list and tab trigger components with underline-focused classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage sync and provides helpers to toggle, add, remove, and clear bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context for Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Returns whether a given media query matches and updates reactively on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor queries and mutations for ponds, profiles, membership, and search using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode themes, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notation like k, M, or B.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Validates and compresses images client‑side, handling resizing, GIF detection, and output optimization.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to strict alphanumeric rules and provides error messages.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link via Web Share API or falls back to clipboard copying with toast feedback.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes tag strings to alphanumeric format and returns user-friendly errors.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, user IDs, and Froggy Phrase recovery using localStorage with hashing, backup, and restore logic.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-post view cooldown tracking in localStorage with check, record, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with platform description, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with loading states, membership indicators, and links to pond pages.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form for creating a lily post with pond selection, tags, media handling, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating a new pond with name validation, description, optional images, and compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a post creation page.

frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main feed of lilies with sorting, search support, and sidebars, showing skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single lily with comments, likes, view tracking, and ribbit creation, including cooldown logic for view increments.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays detailed pond information including moderators, visibility, creation date, and membership actions.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Shows a pond’s feed with its lilies, join/leave functionality, and loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a post page.

frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays posts for a specific tag with canonicalization, sorting options, and sidebar layout.
